name: Frontline Saturn
description:
I am a member of a team of 4 called Pulsar Regions working on creating a 2D Space MMO - which we hope to complete within 3-4 years as we´ve been working towards it for +5 years. However since funding has become a growing problem for us, we´ve decided to share a series of Mini Games for free! However, if you like the Mini Games please feel free to help us fund our Main Projects!

 This is Frontline Saturn (Mini Game)  - If you want to support us / Pay us, we can make a customized version of Frontline Saturn with a few of the units from our MMO which are otherwise not publicly available yet. :) 
    - Don´t pay for the game! But Feel Free to Donate via https://www.paypal.com/pools/c/87auI31j67
 

 The Main Project which is is closest to completion is called Citizens of Laniakea & is in many ways a smaller version of our MMO, which utilize the same graphics: Check out COL here: 

Real Life Communication Available via https://discord.gg/trp9Aq
 You can also Contact me via Twitter: @VBjornskov
Our 2 programmers had nothing to do with our Give-Away Games as they are focusing on our Main Projects, hence communication & any questions related to the code of Frontline Saturn should be directed at me.
